description: The degenerate priest who wears the iron blue robe and the physically strongest Youkai in the Nura household. He used to be a monk who killed many warriors. He has fists that can crush rock and palms that can fit a person`s head. He was enlightened by a holy man. He wishes to protect children after being enlightened. The holy man once stated that it is up to him whether to become human again or a raging god, he almost became human but he killed the people who were torturing the children he wishes to protect while crying. He is often seen with Kurotabou and the two are known as the assault officers of the Nura House. He has a skull necklace that when removed greatly increases his strength. He is also the leader of a biker gang called the Blood Night Hyakki Yakou. Part of Rikuo`s new "Hyakki Yakou" he is in Kyoto along with Yuki Onna. He fought and managed to kill Shoukera.
name: Aotabou
